eventDecorators.name: Donation
eventDecorators.description: Transmits the address of the donor and the amount donated.

functionDecorators.name: deposit
functionDecorators.description: Redirects the specified amount to the target charity and transfers the rest to the target address. Whenever a transfer of funds is complete, it emits the event `Donation`.

parameterDecorators.name: destinationAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The target address to send fund to.

parameterDecorators.name: charityIndex
parameterDecorators.description: The target index of the charity to send the specified amount.

parameterDecorators.name: donationAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount to send to the target charity.

functionDecorators.name: deposit
functionDecorators.description: Redirects 10% of the total transferred funds to the target charity and transfers the rest to the target address. Whenever a transfer of funds is complete, it emits the event `Donation`.

parameterDecorators.name: destinationAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The target address to send fund to.

parameterDecorators.name: charityIndex
parameterDecorators.description: The target index of the charity to send the 10% of the funds.

functionDecorators.name: getAddresses
functionDecorators.description: Returns all the available charity addresses.

functionDecorators.name: getHighestDonation
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address that made the highest donation, along with the amount donated.

functionDecorators.name: getTotalDonationsAmount
functionDecorators.description: Returns the total amount raised by all donations (in wei) towards any charity.
